benchmark_details.name: Qbias - A Dataset on Media Bias in Search Queries and Query Suggestions
benchmark_details.overview: Qbias is a large dataset of Google and Bing search queries, a scraping tool and dataset for biased news articles, as well as language models for the investigation of bias in online search.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide datasets and language models for bias research in online information search.

data.source: Search queries and articles from Google, Bing, and AllSides
data.annotation: Manual annotation by experts for bias labeling

methodology.calculation: Performance evaluated on the difference in predictions between left and right biased models.
methodology.interpretation: Lower RBO scores indicate better model differentiation between political stances.
methodology.validation: Models validated through manual assessment and quantitative measures.

harm: Risk of reproducing biased and harmful language outputs
